app.title: Home Inspector
app.subtitle: Professional Home Inspection
app.description: Discover our services to ensure the safety and value of your home.

humidity.title: Wall Humidity Check
humidity.description: We identify hidden moisture damage before it becomes costly. Our professional humidity meter detects trapped moisture inside walls that's invisible to the naked eye.

electrical.title: Electrical Inspection
electrical.description: We verify the safety of your wiring and outlets. Our diagnostic tools reveal hidden faults, overloaded circuits, and outdated connections that pose fire risks.

laser.title: Laser Measurement
laser.description: We deliver precise room dimensions with laser accuracy. Every measurement is documented to the millimeter — essential for renovations and furniture planning.

thermal.title: Thermal Imaging
thermal.description: We reveal hidden heat loss through your windows and walls. Our thermal camera shows exactly where insulation is failing and cold air is getting in.

hero.h1: Know what you're buying – before it costs you millions.
hero.subtitle: Non-destructive home and apartment condition assessment with professional instruments: thermal camera, wall moisture measurement, basic electrical check, precise laser survey. You'll receive a clear, illustrated report – with risks, priorities, and recommended next steps.
promises: Tracking hidden defects – leaks, mold risk, thermal bridges, heat loss.
Not guessing, measuring – documented results, photos + thermal images.
Decision-support report – what's urgent, what can wait, what's risky.
hero.trustText: Whether you're buying, selling, renovating, or in a dispute with a contractor – you won't get answers based on "gut feeling" here, but a measurement-backed picture of the property's condition.
hero.scrollPrompt: Scroll down to see what we can detect without any damage.

howItWorks.title: 4 steps to a clear picture
steps: Brief consultation (5 min) – what's the goal: buying / selling / renovation / defect investigation
On-site measurement – multiple points, fully documented
Analysis + report – with images, measured values, and conclusions
Action list – what's urgent, what's "nice to have", what's the risk

humidity.title: Wall moisture and mold risk – before it becomes visible
useCases: narrowing down suspected leaks or moisture intrusion
pre-renovation "don't wall over the problem" check
reportIncludes: recommended next steps (e.g., ventilation, drying, source investigation)
humidity.trustNote: Because moisture is one of the most expensive surprises.

electrical.title: Basic electrical check – so the fuse box doesn't blow your budget
checks: distribution board visual inspection, basic condition
typical signs of electrical safety risks
signs of overloading (e.g., overheating marks, suspected wiring issues)
condition of outlets and switches (common faults)

thermal.title: Thermal camera inspection – when the walls reveal where the heat escapes
detects: thermal bridges (cold corners, floor slab junctions, ring beams)
heat leakage around windows and doors
cold surfaces that increase comfort and mold risk
reportIncludes: annotations and brief explanations: "what this means for you"
recommendation: sealing / thermal bridge treatment / ventilation / insulation direction
thermal.trustNote: Thermal cameras are most accurate when there's a sufficient temperature difference between inside and outside – we coordinate this in advance.
